A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not perfect\, but I still enjoyed it a lot. Mark Hamill was incredible. The tone at the beginning felt off\, but it became stronger as it went along. It was a story about failure (like in Empire Strikes Back) but there certainly was still plenty of hope left for the next episode to wrap up this current trilogy. I'm a lifelong Star Wars fan and this had some wonderful moments. I don't want to say more and spoil it for those who still haven't seen it so I'll just recommend you go and judge for yourself.
